In questo contesto ho curato la migrazione della posta elettronica da Microsoft Exchange Server 2003 a Microsoft Exchenge Server 2010 integrando quest’ultimo con il servizio BlackBerry Enterprise Server 5. 
Ho sostituito il vecchio proxy basato su Microsoft ISA Server 2006 con Microsoft Threat Management Gateway Server 2010 implementandone le policy. 
Ho progettato ed implementato le policy di backup con Symantec Backup Exec 2010 R3. 
Ho progettato ed implementato le policy di distribuzione, installazione e reboot degli aggiornamenti Windows utilizzando Windows Server Upadate Services associato alle Group Policy di dominio. 
Ho curato personalmente l’installazione sia hardware che software di 10 server Dell R410 che formano oggi un nuovo ambiente virtuale VMware ESXi 4.1 che coestite con il già presente ambiente virtuale VMware ESXi 4.0. 
Per la realizzazione dell’ ambiente VMware ESXi 4.1 ho configurato 4 switches Dell con le relative Vlan. 
La Storage Area Network è composta da due storage Dell con dischi Sata e Sas configurati con RAID 50. 
Gestisco il firewall aziendale tramite l’apparato WatchGuard XTM520 implementando VPN, NAT e flow controll.

13 years of customer support experience Experience Software tester Lenovo 2011  –  2013  (2 years) Senior Software tester Wells Fargo May 2010  –  March 2011  (11 months) Winston-Salem, NC Project Description:  
The objective of this project is to map existing products of Wachovia Corporation to Wells Fargo Corporation in the Migration process, based on entitlements and usage to corresponding Wells Fargo Commercial Electronic Office Applications as defined in the Functional System Design. 
 
•Created detailed test case scenarios and Execution Records in HP Quality Center, as per Functional System Design Document and prepared detailed test cases for review for each and every phase of the software development life cycle, maintained and executed the test cases. 
•Attended meetings with developers/Testers to discuss the software testing methods/scopes and monitored the status of opened defects and ran reports on those defects, reported the test results and analysis. 
•Created data for test environment by data mining from a production environment to simulate the test production environment.  
•Tested the application for Functional verification testing, System verification testing, Regression testing, and Release to production testing on successful migration of products. 
•Performed both front-end and back-end testing on GUI and SQL database and ongoing design changes in database tables/views and feedback file validation.  
•Identified and Documented defects in Rational Clear Quest - defect tracking tool to track the defect. 
•Documented the testing procedures where ever necessary and conducted knowledge transfer meetings between testers. Software tester Elster Integrated Solutions Raleigh, NC October 2007  –  November 2008  (1 year 2 months) Raleigh •Analyzed System Design Document and component level document and prepared test cases for each and every phase of the software development life cycle. 
•Well experienced to create test case scenario and Execution Record in HP Quality Center.  
•Installing Metering Automation Server (MAS) with Apache web server and Oracle database and upgrading/migrating to newer versions for the use of me and other testers. 
•Manually tested the entire application for Functional verification testing, component verification testing, System verification testing, Regression testing, Release to manufacturing testing, and Exploratory testing. Used SOAPUI for Regression and Load testing on MAS. 
•In an Agile environment where there were frequent changes in requirements from customers to implement in the application before delivery. The application was tested for those new last minute changes and also for any unexpected results due to those changes. 
•Electricity Meters were configured through either Telephone Modem or TCPIP network for successful data transfer upload/download between them.  
•Extensively worked testing on Client/Server and web based applications as per the test plan and verifying the captured data in XML file and with SQL quarries to the oracle database and the actual data available in the device. And ensuring that all release candidate packages are complete in all respect.  
•Updated the meters with latest Firm-Wares and as a requirement to test MAS for customer reported issues. Preparing of network based test bed, comprising of meters suitable for residential and commercial and industrial metering automation and HAN Zigbee devices to handle Critical Tier Overriding. 
•Documented installation, configuring and testing procedures and trained the new staff. Worked with developers to understand the new features and its impact on existing functionality and load/stress/volume and performance testing using the provided scripts.
